results.content: Before taking the course, I have the idea that plugin in WordPress means the installation of software to my website for some specific function just like chrome extension. But here I have learned that functions that I need in my webpage can be done by coding myself.  Here inserting calendar, editing tools ( bold, italic, text-align, etc ) is new to me.
results.content_html: Before taking the course, I have the idea that plugin in WordPress means the installation of software to my website for some specific function just like chrome extension. But here I have learned that functions that I need in my webpage can be done by coding myself. Here inserting calendar, editing tools ( bold, italic, text-align, etc ) is new to me.
